only company that's going to be

it's going to be Amazon it's going to be

they have about 25 million fans who

now that things are not going well and Q

now
37 State Attorney General's they are

what these developers did with all the

including audits to ensure developers

states were impacted
when did Facebook learn of this breach

and once again Obama was saying that
